title: Weather App
description: This Weather App is built using React.js and fetches weather data from the OpenWeatherMap API. It allows users to search for a city and get the current weather information, including temperature, humidity, and weather conditions.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: This is a simple Tic Tac Toe game built using React.js and Material-UI. The game allows two players to play against each other, taking turns to place their marks (X or O) on a 3x3 grid. The first player to get three of their marks in a row (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally) wins the game.

title: Stationery Management System
description: The Stationery Management System is a desktop application developed for managing college stationery distribution. The application is built using Java Swing for the user interface and MySQL for the database, with JDBC for database connectivity.
technologies: Java, Java Swing, MySQL, JDBC (Java Database Connectivity)
